price: 119. Nous le sauvâmes alors ainsi que ceux qui étaient avec lui dans l’Arche chargée.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu waman maʿahu fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
